choices: Mysterious worn out alien tech (that's somehow still functional)
1.content:
Deep down within the ocean depths, lied a legendary beast known by many as 'Godzilla'. At a height of over 300'0", Godzilla truly is a sight to behold. As they swam through the depths of the ocean, everything seed normal. No strange turns of events, no other kaiju's, nothing special as of right now. However, that changes when something caught the big g's eye.

(What did Godzilla find???)
1.title: The beginning of the growth

12.content:
Godzilla just so happens to find a giant white crystal down the ocean floor. Seeing this makes him curious, and he swam his way towards the crystal to get a better look at it.

'Just what on earth is THIS doing here???'

Godzilla thought to himself as he observes the crystal. Suddenly, the crystal begins to emit a low rumbling sound until it abruptly engulfs the big g in a shining white light. Godzilla roars in slight pain until the light quickly diminished. He opens his eyes again, only to see that the crystal had disappeared.

' huh, where did it go?! '

Baffled, Godzilla looks around for any signs of the crystal, only to find none. He then shrugged it off as nothing and continues on his mary way.

*LATER THAT NIGHT*

Godzilla slept in the deep caverns of the ocean, his brain conjuring up many dreams. However, unbeknownst to the big g, he was changing!.

(What happens to Godzilla???)
12.title: An odd glowing crystal

info.brief_description: Godzilla grows MUCH bigger!! No limits to his size!!
info.description: no rules just yet, I do want to see Godzilla become God of everything eventually! sex, gay or straight is allowed. just no pee or poop fetish please.
